- *When do you notice these feelings showing up the most?*  
- *What tends to make them feel stronger — or a little lighter?*

> “It makes sense you’d feel that way. You’ve been navigating all of this on your own, and it takes real strength just to keep going. Maybe we can look together at one small, manageable step that could help you feel just a bit more grounded.”  

From an experienced helper’s standpoint, I’d encourage you to take things in pieces — journaling or naming what’s hardest, reaching out to someone safe if you need connection, and giving yourself permission not to have everything figured out right now.  

So, if you’d like, tell me a little more about what’s been feeling most confusing or heavy lately — we can explore it gently, one layer at a time.
